name: Worn Triplejolt
raw:
</font><font color=#009B00>

This Instruction Manual will teach you how to assemble a:
 'Worn Triplejolt'
The Construction kit. must be between Quality Level  81 and  100.
All other pieces must be of AT LEAST that level range... 
Add them using shift+right-click.
 Add in following order:

 1. Shotgun Weapons Construction kit. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400

 2. Ultra Short Composite Barrel. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  243 ->  300

 3. Jandawit Cleanup Cluster. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  284 ->  350

 4. Nano Pylon. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250

 5. Nano Pylon. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250

 6. Notum Alloy Strengthened Ribs. SkillTo Assemble: Mech. Engi:  202 ->  250

 7. Energy Conduction Rack. SkillTo Assemble: Quantum FT:  263 ->  325

 8. Hyper Carbo-Ceramic Cooling System. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400

 9. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 1x Layer. SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra:  122 ->  150

 10. Radioactive Isotope Fusion System. SkillTo Assemble: Quantum FT:  324 ->  400

 11. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 2x Layer. SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra:  162 ->  200

 12. Rapid-Reload-And-Fire Gyro. SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt:  324 ->  400
